title: How to Change a Bike Tire
content: Step-by-step instructions to replace a bike tire...

steps.name: Remove wheel
steps.text: Open quick-release and remove the wheel.

steps.name: Lever the tire
steps.text: Insert tire levers to unseat the bead.

steps.name: Replace tube
steps.text: Remove old tube, insert new tube slightly inflated.

steps.name: Reseat & inflate
steps.text: Reseat bead evenly and inflate to PSI spec.
